m_szDocSumamry: BYD Sells Another 2,200 Electric Buses & Taxis in China March 10th, 2014 by Roy L Hales   Editor’s Note: we’ve been covering BYD’s cost-competitive electric bus for a long time now , and have enthusiastically shared news of many small orders, but orders totaling 1,800 electric buses is huge. Let’s hope we see more such orders soon. Originally published on the ECOreport . Build Your Dreams’ (BYD) sale of 1,800 electric buses and 400 electric taxis this week is the most recent example of how this Chinese company is expanding into the world market.
